title: Volodymyr Bezubyak
text:
Volodymyr Bezubyak (; born 23 March 1957 in <a href="Lviv">Lviv</a>) is a former <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> and Soviet <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach as well as former professional <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>.
Career.
In early 2016, he worked a senior coach performed functions of de facto senior team head coach for <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">FC Karpaty Lviv</a> along with <a href="Oleh%20Luzhnyi">Oleh Luzhnyi</a> who was head coach de jure.
